dcterms:creator: S. Hochreiter
J. Schmidhuber
dcterms:description: The copying memory task tests the network's ability to remember information over many time steps, where the network receives a sequence of symbols followed by a blank symbol and a recall marker.
dcterms:title: Copying Memory Task

dcterms:creator: L. Jing
C. GÃ¼lc ehre
J. Peurifoy
Y. Shen
M. Tegmark
M. Soljacic
Y. Bengio
dcterms:description: The denoising task tests both the memorization and forgetting ability of RNN architectures, where symbols are separated by noise in a long sequence.
dcterms:title: Denoising Task

dcterms:creator: M. P. Marcus
B. Santorini
M. A. Marcinkiewicz
dcterms:description: The Penn Treebank Corpus is a large annotated corpus of English used for various natural language processing tasks, including character level language modeling.
dcterms:title: Penn Treebank Corpus (PTB)

dcterms:creator: Q. V. Le
N. Jaitly
G. E. Hinton
dcterms:description: Permuted Sequential MNIST is a benchmark task that measures the performance of RNNs in modeling complex long-term dependencies by applying a fixed permutation to the pixel sequence of MNIST digits.
dcterms:title: Permuted Sequential MNIST
